kill2: Some of my scouts reported taking fire from some assholes while they were doing a job for me,
Its impossible to move shipments lately, thanks to these fucks,
A couple of my guys were just gunned down by some locals, usually its in the job description but it happened right outside,
A delivery I've been waiting for has been taken by some wanna be mercenaries,
My shipments have been hijacked by some local fuck wits,
A group of my men were attacked by a small group,
A loyal customer was just killed by some inbred group,
A local group is trying to extort me, if you can believe it.
A small group just tried to hijack one of our trucks, we can't let it go,
A bunch of guys raided one of our stash houses,
It seems like a kill squad is trying to push into our territory,
A local drug dealer has hired some guns to try to take me out, we've put him in the ground but the hired guns are still out there,
The local cartel is pushing into my territory, we're going to have to push back,
Some guys from out of town are trying to get set up here, we're going to have to chase them away,
A group of assholes are hiding out and picking my guys off,
One of our scouts reported seeing a group of guys hijacking one of our trucks,
one of our trucks went missing, we found the driver.. well part of the driver.. nailed to a tree, we have to retaliate.
A convoy was attacked, My men were able to get the better of them but some of the attacker ran,
One of our safe houses was hit last night, the attackers didn't get very far,
I've been getting hit hard lately from a small group,
I can't lose any more men to these fucking assholes, they shoot at everything they see, its just not right.
It seems like the locals have hired a group to come in and clear my men out,
I must have pissed someone off, word on the street is that a hit squad is waiting to ambush me,
A little bird told me that a group of mercenaries have started making the locals pay protection fees,
A couple of guys that used to work for me have been shaking down the locals,
